metadata.title: CVE-2023-6817 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - high
metadata.description: A use-after-free vulnerability in the Linux kernel's netfilter: nf_tablescomponent can be exploited to achieve local privilege escalation. Thefunction nft_pipapo_walk did not skip inactive elements during set walkwhich could lead double deactivations of PIPAPO (Pile Packet Policies)elements, leading to use-after-free. We recommend upgrading past commit317eb9685095678f2c9f5a8189de698c5354316a.
